metadata.description: Official Glean plugins for Cursor — enterprise knowledge, code search, and people discovery.

plugins.name: glean-core
plugins.description: Core Glean MCP integration — shared skills, tool guidance, and rules. Required foundation for all other Glean plugins.

plugins.name: glean-search
plugins.description: Enterprise search across documents, Slack, email, and other sources via Glean.

plugins.name: glean-code
plugins.description: Cross-repository code exploration — search code across your org, find examples, and discover similar implementations.

plugins.name: glean-people
plugins.description: Find experts, understand org structure, and identify stakeholders via Glean.
